verses.verse: Behold <WH2005>, Jehovah<WH3068>'s hand<WH3027> is not shortened<WH7114>, that it cannot save<WH3467>; neither his ear<WH241> heavy<WH3513>, that it cannot hear<WH8085>:
but your iniquities<WH5771> have separated<WH914> between<WH996> you and your God<WH430>, and your sins<WH2403> have hid<WH5641> his face<WH6440> from you<WH8085>, so that he will not hear.

For your hands<WH3709> are defiled<WH1351> with blood<WH1818>, and your fingers<WH676> with iniquity<WH5771>; your lips<WH8193> have spoken<WH1696> lies<WH8267>, your tongue<WH3956> muttereth<WH1897> wickedness<WH5766>.

None sueth<WH7121> in righteousness<WH6664>, and none pleadeth<WH8199> in truth<WH530>: they trust<WH982> in vanity<WH8414>, and speak<WH1696> lies<WH7723>; they conceive<WH2029> mischief<WH5999>, and bring forth<WH3205> iniquity<WH205>.

They hatch<WH1234> adders<WH6848>' eggs<WH1000>, and weave<WH707> the spider<WH5908>'s web<WH6980>: he that eateth<WH398> of their eggs<WH1000> dieth<WH4191>; and that which is crushed<WH2116> breaketh out<WH1234> into a viper<WH660>.

Their webs<WH6980> shall not become garments<WH899>, neither shall they cover<WH3680> themselves with their works<WH4639>: their works<WH4639> are works<WH4639> of iniquity<WH205>, and the act<WH6467> of violence<WH2555> is in their hands<WH3709>.

Their feet<WH7272> run<WH7323> to evil<WH7451>, and they make haste<WH4116> to shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818>: their thoughts<WH4284> are thoughts<WH4284> of iniquity<WH205>; desolation<WH7701> and destruction<WH7667> are in their paths<WH4546>.

The way<WH1870> of peace<WH7965> they know<WH3045> not<WH4941>; and there is no justice in their goings<WH4570>: they have made them crooked<WH6140> paths<WH5410>; whosoever goeth<WH1869> therein doth not know<WH3045> peace<WH7965>.

Therefore is justice<WH4941> far<WH7368> from us<WH6666>, neither doth righteousness overtake<WH5381> us<WH6960>: we look for light<WH216>, but<WH2822>, behold, darkness; for brightness<WH5054>, but we walk<WH1980> in obscurity<WH653>.

We grope<WH1659> for the wall<WH7023> like the blind<WH5787>; yea<WH1659>, we grope as they that have no eyes<WH5869>: we stumble<WH3782> at noonday<WH6672> as in the twilight<WH5399>; among them that are lusty<WH820> we are as dead men<WH4191>.

We roar<WH1993> all like bears<WH1677>, and moan<WH1897> sore<WH1897> like doves<WH3123>: we look<WH6960> for justice<WH4941>, but there is none<WH3444>; for salvation, but it is far off from us<WH7368>.

For our transgressions<WH6588> are multiplied<WH7231> before thee<WH2403>, and our sins testify<WH6030> against us<WH6588>; for our transgressions are with us<WH5771>, and as for our iniquities, we know them<WH3045>:

transgressing <WH6586> and denying<WH3584> Jehovah<WH3068>, and turning away<WH5253> from<WH310> following our God<WH430>, speaking<WH1696> oppression<WH6233> and revolt<WH5627>, conceiving<WH2029> and uttering<WH1897> from the heart<WH3820> words<WH1697> of falsehood<WH8267>.

And justice<WH4941> is turned away<WH5253> backward<WH268>, and righteousness<WH6666> standeth<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>; for truth<WH571> is fallen<WH3782> in the street<WH7339>, and uprightness<WH5229> cannot<WH3201> enter<WH935>.

Yea <WH571>, truth is lacking<WH5737>; and he that departeth<WH5493> from evil<WH7451> maketh himself a prey<WH7997>. And Jehovah<WH3068> saw<WH7200> it<WH3415>, and it displeased him that there was no justice<WH4941>.

And he saw<WH7200> that there was no man<WH376>, and wondered<WH8074> that there was no intercessor<WH6293>: therefore his own arm<WH2220> brought salvation<WH3467> unto him<WH6666>; and his righteousness, it upheld him<WH5564>.

And he put on<WH3847> righteousness<WH6666> as a breastplate<WH8302>, and a helmet<WH3553> of salvation<WH3444> upon his head<WH7218>; and he put on<WH3847> garments<WH899> of vengeance<WH5359> for clothing<WH8516>, and was clad<WH5844> with zeal<WH7068> as a mantle<WH4598>.

According to<WH5921> their deeds<WH1578>, accordingly he will repay<WH7999>, wrath<WH2534> to his adversaries<WH6862>, recompense<WH1576> to his enemies<WH341>; to the islands<WH339> he will repay<WH7999> recompense<WH1576>.

So shall they fear<WH3372> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> from the west<WH4628>, and his glory<WH3519> from the rising<WH4217> of the sun<WH8121>; for he<WH6862> will come<WH935> as a rushing stream<WH5104>, which the breath<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068> driveth<WH5127>.
And a Redeemer<WH1350> will come<WH935> to Zion<WH6726>, and unto them that turn<WH7725> from transgression<WH6588> in Jacob<WH3290>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.

And as for me<WH1285>, this is my covenant with them<WH559>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>: my Spirit<WH7307> that is upon thee<WH1697>, and my words which I have put<WH7760> in thy mouth<WH6310>, shall not depart<WH4185> out of thy mouth<WH6310>, nor out of the mouth<WH6310> of thy seed<WH2233>, nor out of the mouth<WH6310> of thy seed<WH2233>'s seed<WH2233>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, from henceforth and for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.
